predicate.note: Frames file for 'resurrect' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: only transitive
example.text: Some may be tempted to argue that the idea of a strategic review merely resurrects the infamous Zero-Based Budgeting concept of the Carter administration.
example.arg: the idea of a strategic review
the infamous Zero-Based Budgeting concept of the Carter administration
